issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Unignore some roundtrip tests that are passing now
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10413](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10413). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We had some roundtrip Parquet -> Arrow tests that were failing so we ignored them, but now there has been more work and they pass!

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10413?focusedCommentId=17222938) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8546
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8546>
